item.title: Chef Sever 12
item.description: On production enviroment, chef server is recommended when you need to manage more than one machine at a time. three types: Hosted Enterprise Chef On Premises (Private) Enterprise Chef Open Source Chef There is a good tutorial about setting up chef server 12. However, there are some differences when applying to the latest chef-server release version. For our example, Enviroment: workstation: macOS Sierra 10.12.2 chef server and nodes: Vagrant based CentOS 6.
